H0.text: What name is given to the supercontinent thought to exist 300 million years ago. Nova Terra

H1.text: What name is given to the supercontinent thought to exist 300 million years ago. Urkontinent

H2.text: What name is given to the supercontinent thought to exist 300 million years ago. Globia

H3.text: What name is given to the supercontinent thought to exist 300 million years ago. Pang√¶a

A4.text: Pangaea or Pangea was a supercontinent that existed during the late Paleozoic and early Mesozoic eras.

A5.text: Pangaea is the most recent supercontinent reconstructed from the geologic record and therefore is by far the best understood.
